meanings.definition: To weep over; to lament or mourn for.
meanings.sent1: She beweeps the loss of her favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: The child beweeps loudly at the sight of a scraped knee.
meanings.sent3: The puppy beweeps when left alone in the house.
meanings.sent4: The old tree beweeps the passing of each season.
meanings.sent5: The sad song beweeps the heartache of lost love.

meanings.definition: To express sorrow or grief through tears.
meanings.sent1: He beweeps the tragic ending of the story.
meanings.sent2: The widow beweeps at the funeral of her husband.
meanings.sent3: The little girl beweeps when her ice cream falls on the ground.
meanings.sent4: The stormy sky beweeps its heavy rain upon the earth.
meanings.sent5: The movie beweeps the struggles of the main character.
